node.excerpt: Front-end developer fell in love with Threefold

node.name: Jonas Delrue
node.bio: As a student, Jonas was already programming for Cisco, Excentis and other IT firms. During his professional career, Jonas had various positions from developer over team leader to CTO of Artilium, leading a team of 40 developers and testers. Right now Jonas is technical lead and founder within Jimber.
node.excerpt: Jonas is technical lead and founder within Jimber.

node.name: Ken De Moor
node.bio: Quality Assurance Engineer working for Jimber and helping test and organize threefold projects. QA Engineer fell in love with Threefold Because I like to work on new and exciting technologies that could change the world.
node.excerpt: Quality Assurance Engineer working for Jimber and helping test and organize threefold projects.
